mapper.select: select gds.* from web_menu_goods as wmg left join best_seller_goods as bsg in wmg.goodsId = bsg.goodsId left join goods as gds in bsg.goodsId = gds.id where menuId = wmg.menuId

select goods.*, min(gp.price) as lowest_price,bsg.img_url as image_major from goods LEFT join best_sellers_goods as bsg on goods.id = bsg.goods_id LEFT join goods_price as gp on goods.id = gp.goods_id GROUP by goods.id
